# 1ã€ç®€å•æ¸²æŸ“

<body>
    <div id="container"></div>
    <script src="./js/mustache.js"></script>
    <script>
        let templateStr = "<h1>æˆ‘ä¹°äº†ä¸€ä¸ª{{thing}}, å¥½{{mood}}å•Š!</h1>";

        let data = {
            thing: "åä¸ºæ‰‹æœº",
            mood: "å¼€å¿ƒ",
        };

        let domStr = Mustache.render(templateStr, data);

        document.getElementById("container").innerHTML = domStr;
    </script>
</body>

# 2ã€å¸ƒå°”å€¼

<body>
    <div id="container"></div>

    <script src="./js/mustache.js"></script>
    <script>
        let templateStr = `
        {{#isShow}}
            <h1>ä½ å¥½</h1>
        {{/isShow}}`;

        let data = {
            isShow: false,
        };

        let domStr = Mustache.render(templateStr, data);
        document.getElementById("container").innerHTML = domStr;
    </script>
</body>

# 3ã€å¾ªç¯ç®€å•æ•°ç»„

<body>
    <div id="container"></div>

    <script src="./js/mustache.js"></script>
    <script>
        let templateStr = `
            <ul>
                {{#arr}}
                    <li>{{.}}</li>
                {{/arr}}
            </ul>
        `;

        let data = {
            arr: ["A", "B", "C", "D", "E", "F"],
        };

        let domStr = Mustache.render(templateStr, data);
        document.getElementById("container").innerHTML = domStr;
    </script>
</body>
